ai-atk-s0510a19:1_0: Here the old jackals and color of flowers,
ai-atk-s0510a19:2_0: There are twenty senior mendicants here who are twenty, thirty, forty, fifty, or fifty junior, a hundred, a thousand, a hundred thousand rebirths of gods.
ai-atk-s0510a19:2_1: For it is the formerly a fully awakened Buddha—who have made merit and degrad by discontent, to stay in the presence of those senior monks, and all the place of loss.
